display_information.name: Elmo
display_information.long_description:
Hello, I'm Elmo,

I know my way around Feedback to help users provide their feedback anonymously, but still give managers enough freedom to further elaborate. 

Hereâ€™s what I can do:
*Submit Feedback*:
   - Share feedback about someone confidentially. (_add as many details as possible_)
   - *Format*: `/give-feedback @recipient your feedback`
   - *Example*: `/give-feedback @john_doe Great job on the project etc. etc.!`
ðŸ’¡ _Note: you can do this anywhere, in any chat, any time, it will only be seen by you as it's ephemeral messaging. If you have any doubts - do it in your own DMs or with me._
  
*Retrieve Feedback (Managers Only)*:
   - View feedback submitted for one or more people.
   - *Format*: `/get-feedback <password> @recipient1, @recipient2...`
   - *Example*: `/get-feedback secret123 @john_doe, @jane_smith`
ðŸ’¡ _Note: you can do this anywhere, in any chat, any time, it will only be seen by you as it's ephemeral messaging. If you have any doubts - do it in your own DMs or with me._

*Help*:
   - Get this Elmo help message anytime.
   - *Command*: `/help`
  
ðŸ’¡ _Note: All messages sent to me are confidential and will be deleted after processing. No names and emails are being saved and feedback is encrypted_

:elmo: _*Managers* can also initiate a confidential & anonymous discussion about specific feedback item, Elmo will act as a middle man to convey the messages and keep both parties anonymous. When this happens a private thread will be initiated in both people DM chats with Elmo, where they can communicate in the thread._
